statements: SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, category FROM inventory_management WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE last_replenished < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, category FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, category, last_replenished FROM inventory_management ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT id, item_name, category FROM inventory_management WHERE last_replenished >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, quantity, last_replenished FROM inventory_management WHERE category IN ('Office Supplies', 'Furniture')
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE last_replenished BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT seed_name, expiration_date FROM seeds ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE seed_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM chemicals WHERE hazard_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM seeds s JOIN chemicals c ON s.seed_id = c.chemical_id WHERE c.hazard_level = 'High' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT c.chemical_name, c.quantity, s.seed_name FROM chemicals c JOIN seeds s ON c.chemical_id = s.seed_id WHERE c.quantity > 50 ORDER BY c.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM seeds ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT fertilizer_name, last_replenished FROM fertilizers WHERE last_replenished < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE last_replenished < '2022-12-31';
SELECT fertilizer_name, quantity FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT pesticide_name, quantity FROM pesticides ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM replenishment_history WHERE replenishment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY seed_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE expiry_date >= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_type, COUNT(*) AS total_replenishments FROM replenishment_history GROUP BY item_type;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, DATE_PART('day', AGE(expiry_date, CURRENT_DATE)) AS days_until_expiry FROM seeds WHERE expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT pesticide_name, replenishment_date FROM pesticides INNER JOIN replenishment_history ON pesticides.pesticide_id = replenishment_history.item_id ORDER BY replenishment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, seed_quantity FROM seeds WHERE seed_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers ORDER BY fertilizer_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT inventory_id, item_type, item_quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'seeds';
SELECT * FROM seeds ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT seed_name, seed_quantity FROM seeds WHERE seed_price > 10 ORDER BY seed_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE fertilizer_quantity < 100 ORDER BY fertilizer_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT item_type, item_quantity, last_replenishment_date FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 3 AND item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_replenishment_date DESC;
